function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Experimental studies with simulated aerosol particles in various indoor environments","Impact":"Inadequate understanding of how real infectious aerosol particles behave in different indoor settings","Mitigation":"Conducting more studies with real infectious aerosol particles in different indoor settings to understand their behavior","Technologies":"High-efficiency particulate air (HEPA)-filtered portable air cleaners (PACs) for reducing aerosol concentration","People":"Researchers, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Mixed effects of combining ventilation and PACs in buildings with central ventilation systems","Impact":"Inconsistent reduction in aerosol concentration, leading to uncertainty in the effectiveness of combined measures","Mitigation":"Conducting further research to optimize the combination of ventilation and PACs in different building types","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, PACs","People":"Building owners, facility managers","Owner":"Building management, HVAC companies"},{"Description":"Diminished efficiency of PACs as mechanical ventilation in rooms increases","Impact":"Decreased effectiveness of PACs in reducing pathogen contamination in rooms with mechanical ventilation systems","Mitigation":"Implementing guidelines for optimizing the use of PACs in rooms with mechanical ventilation systems","Technologies":"Guidelines for optimizing PAC use in rooms with mechanical ventilation systems","People":"Facility managers, building maintenance staff","Owner":"Facility management, public health organizations"}]}
